e="preserve"> was a very old province of Japan in the area of Hyūga Province on the island of Honshū. Its boundaries are within Miyazaki Prefecture.
History.
Komaso is part of the tale of Yamato Takeru which is recorded in the "Kojiki." The history of Komaso started and ended before the Taihō Code was established at the beginning of the 8th century.
